languages.text: {n}Всмотревшись, вы замечаете на коже двойников едва заметные шрамы — следы скальпеля, исказившего их внешность. Искусная работа, но не настолько, чтобы обмануть придирчивый взгляд.{/n}

{n}After getting a better look at the doppelgangers, you notice faint scars on their skin left by the scalpel that has transformed their appearance. Subtle as their sculptor's handiwork may be, it does not stand up to your scrutiny.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Всмотревшись, вы замечаете на коже двойников едва заметные шрамы — следы скальпеля, исказившего их внешность. Искусная работа, но не настолько, чтобы обмануть придирчивый взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}After getting a better look at the doppelgangers, you notice faint scars on their skin left by the scalpel that has transformed their appearance. Subtle as their sculptor's handiwork may be, it does not hold up to your scrutiny.{/n}

{n}After getting a better look at the doppelgangers, you notice faint scars on their skin left by the scalpel that has transformed their appearance. Subtle as their sculptor's handiwork may be, it does not stand up to your scrutiny.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tras echar un vistazo más conciso a la copias, percibes cicatrices en su piel, obra del bisturí que transformó su apariencia. Puede que la manufactura del escultor sea discreta, pero has conseguido detectarla.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After getting a better look at the doppelgangers, you notice faint scars on their skin left by the scalpel that has transformed their appearance. Subtle as their sculptor's handiwork may be, it does not stand up to your scrutiny.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras echar un vistazo más conciso a la copias, percibes cicatrices en su piel, obra del bisturí que transformó su apariencia. Puede que la manufactura del escultor sea discreta, pero has conseguido detectarla.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ドッペルゲンガーをよく見ると、その肌にメスを使って姿を変えられた跡がうっすら残っていた。彫刻家が直したような中々気付けない傷だが、こちらの観察力には耐えられない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After getting a better look at the doppelgangers, you notice faint scars on their skin left by the scalpel that has transformed their appearance. Subtle as their sculptor's handiwork may be, it does not stand up to your scrutiny.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ドッペルゲンガーをよく見ると、その肌にメスを使って姿を変えられた跡がうっすら残っていた。彫刻家が直したような中々気付けない傷だが、こちらの観察力には耐えられない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你仔细观察着那两个冒牌货，留意到她们的皮肤上残留着难以察觉的疤痕，那是手术刀进行全身塑型手术时留下的疤痕。尽管血伶人的手艺非常精湛，但依然禁不起你仔细观察。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After getting a better look at the doppelgangers, you notice faint scars on their skin left by the scalpel that has transformed their appearance. Subtle as their sculptor's handiwork may be, it does not stand up to your scrutiny.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你仔细观察着那两个冒牌货，留意到她们的皮肤上残留着难以察觉的疤痕，那是手术刀进行全身塑型手术时留下的疤痕。尽管血伶人的手艺非常精湛，但依然禁不起你仔细观察。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nach einem genaueren Blick auf die Doppelgänger bemerkst du verblasste Narben auf ihrer Haut, die das Skalpell hinterließ, das ihr Äußeres verändert hat. So subtil das Werk ihres Schöpfers auch sein mag ... deinem scharfen Auge entgeht nichts.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After getting a better look at the doppelgangers, you notice faint scars on their skin left by the scalpel that has transformed their appearance. Subtle as their sculptor's handiwork may be, it does not stand up to your scrutiny.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einem genaueren Blick auf die Doppelgänger bemerkst du verblasste Narben auf ihrer Haut, die das Skalpell hinterließ, das ihr Äußeres verändert hat. So subtil das Werk ihres Schöpfers auch sein mag ... deinem scharfen Auge entgeht nichts.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après avoir regardé les sosies de plus près, vous remarquez de légères cicatrices sur leur peau, autant de traces laissées par le scalpel qui a entièrement remodelé leur apparence. Aussi discret que soit le travail de leur sculpteur, il ne résiste pas à votre examen minutieux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After getting a better look at the doppelgangers, you notice faint scars on their skin left by the scalpel that has transformed their appearance. Subtle as their sculptor's handiwork may be, it does not stand up to your scrutiny.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir regardé les sosies de plus près, vous remarquez de légères cicatrices sur leur peau, autant de traces laissées par le scalpel qui a entièrement remodelé leur apparence. Aussi discret que soit le travail de leur sculpteur, il ne résiste pas à votre examen minutieux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kopyalara daha dikkatli baktığında görünümlerinin değişmesini sağlayan neşterin tenlerinde bıraktığı silik yara izlerini fark ediyorsun. Heykeltıraşın çalışması ne kadar incelikli olursa olsun tahkikin karşısında başarısızlığa uğruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After getting a better look at the doppelgangers, you notice faint scars on their skin left by the scalpel that has transformed their appearance. Subtle as their sculptor's handiwork may be, it does not stand up to your scrutiny.{/n}
